text:
e="preserve">Koba Davitashvili (; July 31, 1971 – December 2, 2020) was a Georgian politician. He was a leader of the Georgian People's Party and co-founder of the United National Movement. He was a member of the Georgian Parliament between 1999 to 2006.
Davitashvili died on December 2, 2020 in Tbilisi from ankylosing spondylitis, aged 49.
